title: M&S
description:
The data being visualised here is the location of M&S stores. The height of each pixel represents the distance to the closest M&S store as the crow flies.

The location of the M&S stores were scraped from the API that powers the M&S Store Finder (https://www.marksandspencer.com/MSResStoreFinderGlobalBaseCmd). The API was last scraped for updates on 31st May 2021. For more information, the source code that created this dataset is here https://github.com/jamesHargreaves12/DataVis_python.
